page.title: 17Transport through Magor
page.content: Many companies have settled in Magor because of the easy access they have to the M4.Products provided by these companies can be taken to all parts of the country simply by using the M4 and the motorway network. If a company needs to send its product abroad Magor has good transport links with Newport Docks and the Cardiff Wales Airport.The main London to South Wales railway line also passes through Magor,with the stations of Newport and Cardiff making London only hours away. Magor people are lucky because of the village's location,companies have brought many jobs to the area.The village itself has benifited because a by-pass has been build to cope with all the through traffic and this has ensured the village is kept quiet and fairly traffic free.
